title: [Whistler's Pass, Stone Bridge]
description: Peering over the short walls that form the sides of the bridge, a number of small animals can be seen in the space between the two hills.  Small grooves are cut into the walls near the bridge bottom for drainage.  A pair of stone pillars hold iron sconces with burning torches.
